content: LGBTQ website in Singapore **TREVVY** was an [LGBTQ](/wiki/LGBT) website in Singapore. Started August 2006 through a re-branding exercise of Singapore's first gay portal, Trevvy ceased operation in 2021. At one point, Trevvy had over 120,000 registered users. In February 2007, Trevvy.com was awarded the [Hitwise](/wiki/Hitwise) Online Performance Award recognizing it as the most visited gay and [lesbian](/wiki/Lesbian) website in Singapore. In August 2007, Trevvy.com launched an [HIV/AIDS](/wiki/HIV/AIDS_activism) awareness campaign called Evolve which was the first such campaign in Singapore to use [digital animation](/wiki/Digital_animation). Trevvy.com was awarded the Arts Supporter Award by Singapore's [National Arts Council](/wiki/National_Arts_Council,_Singapore) for its contributions towards the local arts scene. On 20 April 2021, Trevvy.com announced on their [Facebook page](/wiki/Facebook_page) its closure effective 30 April 2021. - [Homosocialization](/wiki/Homosocialization) - Trevvy.com This article about lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender or queer related media is a stub.
